original_text: He said to him, ‘I will condemn you with your own words, you wicked servant! You knew that I was a severe man, taking what I did not deposit and reaping what I did not sow?
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 악한 종아 내가 네 말로 너를 심판하노니 너는 내가 두지 않은 것을 취하고 심지 않은 것을 거두는 엄한 사람인 줄로 알았느냐

sentences.original_text: I will condemn you with your own words
You knew that I was a severe man
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 엄한 사람인 줄 알았다

sentences.original_text: taking what I did not deposit
and reaping what I did not sow
